The third annual CNN Heroes were chosen by a panel that included distinguished leaders and humanitarians like Colin Powell , Whoopi Goldberg , Ted Turner , and Elton John . With 9000 nominations from over 100 countries, CNN Heroes captured record attention and

Tony Dungy Expects Michael Vick , Eagles To Reach Deal Courier Post- Tony Dungy , who has served as a mentor to Michael Vick , believes the quarterback will come to terms with the Eagles on a long-term contract. He is very grateful to Jeffrey Lurie and Andy Reid for believing in him and giving him an opportunity, Tony Dungy told the Courier Post.
